channel.title: Links Directory
channel.description:
Ive just made a links directory.
Database: links Tables: car_hire flights holidays hotels restaurants night_life
Each table has 4 fields: id, url, desc, date.
On the links page of my site I have 6 links, each link goes to that tables output page. On the links page is there a way I can show how many links are on that page example:
Car Hire (1) Flights (0) Holidays (3)
I have seen this before but I dont know what its called so I cant do any search :|
Cheers
-Kim

item.title: Links Directory
item.dc:creator: @Kimber Kimber
item.description:
@Kimber wrote:

Thats great cheers. If anyone needs to use this but doesnt understand then just copy and paste this code I found but change the login and database information:

<?php

$connect = mysql_connect("localhost", "username", "password");
mysql_select_db("database", $connect);

$result = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM tablename", $connect);
$num_rows = mysql_num_rows($result);

echo "($num_rows)";

?>
